title: Quarkus Newsletter #32 - May
content: The May newsletter has beens sent. Get a deep dive into the Quarkus 3 release. Learn how to implement built-in and custom Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) in Quarkus to ensure secure REST API access with the "Implementing RBAC in Quarkus" article by Aashreya Shankar.
